hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Intraday Extreme Mean Reversion with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: For high-liquidity meme coins (DOGE, PEPE) during NEUTRAL regimes, a 1-hour price move exceeding ±8% accompanied by volume > 3x 20-hour average will fully retrace 50% of that move within the next 3 hours when contrary to the prevailing daily trend.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins experience exaggerated intraday moves due to retail herd behavior. In neutral markets, these extreme moves often overextend due to leveraged liquidations or social media hype, creating snap-back opportunities when volume spikes indicate exhaustion rather than sustainable momentum.
entry_conditions: Move is opposite direction of 24-hour trend (e.g., spike down during overall uptrend)
Enter at close of the 1-hour candle

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price continues another 4% in same direction (beyond initial move)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 50% of moves retrace 50% within 3 hours. Stop-loss hit rate > 35%.
